title: NYC Shooting: Hero's Sacrifice Saves Lives!
description: Tragedy struck 345 Park Avenue when off-duty NYPD Officer Islam bravely confronted an armed gunman.  While working private security at the Blackstone Group and NFL headquarters building, Officer Islam was fatally shot.  His selfless act underscores the risks faced by law enforcement officers, even outside of active duty.  This video pays tribute to his sacrifice and explores the circumstances surrounding this devastating event. We remember Officer Islam's courage and commitment to protecting others.  His dedication to duty will not be forgotten.  Learn more about this heartbreaking incident and the life of a fallen hero.  Support the family during this difficult time.
hook: Heroic immigrant saves lives in Manhattan.
